text:
VINOTHKUMAR.V
Mob: +91 9787329907                                                                                     
E-mail: Vinothveereswaran04@gmail.com
  
To  work  in  an  organization  providing  good  growth  prospect,  Safe  working  environment,  safe  working
procedure and excellent job satisfaction from safety point of view.
Professional Experience
Working as a EHS Trainee – in SEFORGE LIMITED (SUZLON GROUP OF COMPANIES) at 
Coimbatore from April 2017 to as on date.
Present Job Responsibilities :
       SAFETY :
Daily toolbox talks to all workers.
Issuing Hot, Height, Excavation, Cold work permits.
PPE Record Maintenance.
Maintain relevant HSE logs and documentation
Analyze & Record all Near misses, Incidents and enforcing to take Preventive actions.
 Control of Fire Protection System like Hydrants, Alarm, Extinguisher, etc.
Conduct Frequent Emergency Mock Drill & Fire drills. 
Conduct workplace safety training for workers.
Organizing safety day programs and Safety competition.
Contractor safety management.
Conduct monthly safety committee meeting with the representative of workmen on a regular basis to
Promote safety consciousness among employees.
Monthly internal safety audit 
Hazard identification and risk assessment.
To conduct Lifting tools and tackles inspection by third party
To conduct safety belt inspection by third thirty
To conduct pressure vessel inspection by third party.
Monthly MIS Data reporting.
HEALTH :
Conduct Canteen Committee meeting and prepare MOM.
Maintain Canteen workers Medical examination report.
Conduct safety training for Canteen workers.
Conduct canteen audit.
Maintain Food test and drinking water test report. Monitoring Occupational Health Centre and Ambulance.
ENVIRONMENT :
CSR Activities inside and outside of the premises.
Maintain Work zone monitoring  report.
Monitoring STP operation.
Organize Environment day programs.
Preparing of Form 4 and Form 5 to TNPCB.
Maintain Form 3 and Form 10 as per TNPCB Norms. 
To Ensure Secondary containment for storage of hazardous chemicals,
Provide assistance and advice on HSE issues to make recommendations to the management.
Professional Qualification
M.Tech in Industrial safety Engineering ( 2015-2017) batch in KALASALINGAM UNIVERSITY , 
Krishnankoil,Virudhunagar (D.T) 
B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering (2011-2015) in KALASALINGAM UNIVERSITY, 
Krishnankoil,Virudhunagar (D.T).
Field Work Project & Internship Training
Completed internship project titled “ RISK ASSESSMENT IN LOW SPEED SHAFT GEAR BOX ” 
in Quality, Environmental & Safety at ZF Wind Power Coimbatore Private Limited  for a duration of 
3 months from May2016 – August 2016.
Completed a project titled “ ERGONOMICS STUDY ON FOUNDRY INDUSTRY ” at TVS Brakes 
India Private Limited sholighur at Vellore (DT).
Computer Proficiency
MS-Office – Word, Excel, PowerPoint & MS-Outlook.
Data Analysis, Reporting & Presentation using Excel.
SAP
Good Exposure to Internet.
